original_title: Vajira says delimitation process should be revised again
original_body_lines: Chairman of the United National Party (UNP) Vajira Abeygunawardana says that the delimitation process should be revised again according to the population and the geographical location.
Speaking to the media in Galle, he further mentioned that the delimitation process in Colombo, Gampaha and Kalutara districts has done what he called “serious injustice” to these areas.
